title: Lemon crumb muffins
ingredients: ['225g butter or margarine, softened', '200g caster sugar', '4 eggs, separated', '250g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '125ml fresh lemon juice', 'Crumb topping', '4 tablespoons finely chopped nuts', '2 tablespoons flour', '2 tablespoons brown soft sugar', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
